# 代码片段

{
  "Print to vue2-template": {
    "scope": "vue",
    "prefix": "v2",
    "body": [
      "<template>",
      "  <div class=\"page\"></div>",
      "</template>",
      "",
      "<script>",
      "export default {",
      "  name: 'name'",
      "}",
      "</script>",
      "",
      "<style lang='scss' scoped></style>"
    ],
    "description": "vue2 默认代码片段"
  },
  "Print to vue3-template": {
    "scope": "vue",
    "prefix": "v3",
    "body": [
      "<template>",
      "  <div class=\"page\"></div>",
      "</template>",
      "",
      "<script setup>",
      "</script>",
      "",
      "<style lang='scss' scoped></style>"
    ],
    "description": "vue3 默认代码片段"
  }
}
